sentences.en: Although most of their scales have been lost, tunas and mackerels retain a patch of coarse scales near the head called the corselet.
sentences.cn: 虽然大部分的鱼鳞都脱落了，但是金枪鱼和马鲛鱼在他们的头部附近保留了一些粗糙的可叫做盔甲的鱼鳞。

sentences.en: Cutlass and corselet of steel, and his trusty sword of Damascus.
sentences.cn: 钢刀,盔甲, 和他素来倚重的大马士革利剑.

sentences.en: Follow the lead of of corselet style dress the skirt of 19 centuries fits a style, those who emphasize bosom and hip is curvaceous , protruding shows elegant color of the female.
sentences.cn: 紧身胸衣式连衣裙效仿了十九世纪的裙装风格，强调胸与臀部的曲线美，凸现女性的典雅风格。

sentences.en: Who can strip off his outer garment, or penetrate his double corselet?
sentences.cn: 谁能揭开它的外衣, 谁能穿透它双层的鳞甲?

trans.tran_en: a piece of armour for the top part of the body
